title: CribConnect - Roommate Finder
description: A modern roommate and housing finder web app built with React and Tailwind CSS.
mainDescription: CribConnect helps users seamlessly discover and connect with potential roommates or shared living spaces. Built with a focus on clean UI and robust backend integration using Firebase and MongoDB.

title: Heritage Vault - A Digital Museum
description: A digital gateway to explore and preserve humanityâ€™s cultural heritage online.
mainDescription: Welcome to Heritage Vault, your digital gateway to exploring and appreciating humanity's rich historical and cultural heritage. This platform is dedicated to preserving, documenting, and making rare artifacts accessible to researchers, educators, and curious minds worldwide. By combining cutting-edge web technologies with a passion for history, we ensure that every artifact tells its unique story â€“ protected, understood, and passed on to future generations.

title: Law.BD - Find Your Best Lawyer
description: A platform to connect users with legal professionals across Bangladesh.
mainDescription: Law.BD enables users to find lawyers based on expertise, location, and availability. It simplifies legal consultation by offering profile-based discovery and booking features.
features: Search by practice area and location
Simple UI for fast legal help access
DaisyUI components for a clean UX
